oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: A Visit With Tex Ritter and Roy Acuff
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording is from the Country Music Association's: A Visit With Tex Ritter and Roy Acuff. Recording features Joe Allison (narrator) interviewing Tex Ritter (entertainer) and Roy Acuff (entertainer). Recording was performed live in Las Vegas on January 10, 1964.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Joe Allison; Tex Ritter; Roy Acuff
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Roy Acuff and Tex Ritter praise each other -- (00:16) Joe Allison discusses how Acuff and Ritter would converse, and the Country Music Association's idea to record the two of them -- (01:17) Ritter discusses the number of member types at the Country Music Association, and Acuff reflects on how Gene Autry was associated to the association -- (03:17) Ritter and Acuff reflect on why one show join the Country Music Association and the influence of the Country Music Association
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: Insert displays the recording information for tape reel and associated acetate disc.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Allison, Joe; Ritter, Tex; Ritter, Tex, 1905-1974; Acuff, Roy;
